about.details:
Incorporated in 2005, Rex Sealing and Packing Industries Limited is a manufacturer and exporter of Sealing packing and Insulation products including Jointing Sheets, Fabric Expansion Joints, Gland packing & Ropes, High-Temperature resistant textiles, Ceramic Fiber Products, etc.

The business was first started by Mr Manjunath Nayak under the name M/s Rex Industries for manufacturing Gland Packing.

The vast product portfolio of Rex Sealing and Packing Industries includes:

  1. Compressed Fibre Jointing Sheets / Gaskets
  2. Gland Packing & Ropes
  3. Fabric Expansion Joints
  4. Technical and Heat Resistance Textiles
  5. Ceramic Fiber Product

The company executes in-house manufacturing through its unit situated in MIDC- Taloja Industrial Area, Palekhurd Panvel, Raigad.

The company is also planning to set up an additional manufacturing unit in Anand Nagar, MIDC Ambernath, admeasuring 4000. Sq meter for expansion of business and manufacture. Rex Sealing and Packing Industries will manufacture all types of "Asbestos Free" Gaskets sheets for Automotive, Steel, and other process units through this extension.

They are a customer-centric company, and the products of the company are used by some well-known industrial houses in the Petrochemical, Pharmaceutical, Power, Steel, Cement, Chemical, Gas, and Process industry.

faqs.question: What is the Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 599000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹8.09 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹135 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on December 30, 2022, and closes on January 4, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO opens on December 30, 2022 and closes on January 4, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,35,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO will be done on Monday, January 9, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, January 11, 2023. Check the Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Rex Sealing and Packing Industries IPO listing date is on Thursday, January 12, 2023.
